subject: Re: Samba 3.0.25rc3 Available for Download
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
> Thomas Bork wrote:
>>> Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>>>
>>>> This is the third release candidate of the Samba 3.0.25 code base
>>> The same as in rc2:
>>>
>>> configure with '--without-winbind'
>>>
>>> make: *** No rule to make target `nsswitch/libnss_winbind.so', needed by
>>> `all'.  Stop.
> 
> Fixed.

Funny.  I don't remember sending this as the bug is certainly
not fixed.  I'll blame it on lack of sleep from the conference.





jerry
